meanings.definition: People who have a strong interest in mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: Mycophiles enjoy studying different types of mushrooms.
meanings.sent2: I met a group of mycophiles at the mushroom foraging event.
meanings.sent3: The mycophiles were so excited about the new mushroom species they found.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for mushrooms made her a true mycophile.
meanings.sent5: The mycophiles' knowledge of mushrooms was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of those who love mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: The mycophiles club organized a mushroom tasting event.
meanings.sent2: She wore a mycophiles t-shirt to show her love for mushrooms.
meanings.sent3: The restaurant had a mycophiles special with various mushroom dishes.
meanings.sent4: His mycophiles enthusiasm was contagious among his friends.
meanings.sent5: The mycophiles community shared tips on growing mushrooms at home.
